effect.diamond-pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target. One of these effects is selected at random; they do not each have independent chances to occur.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target. One of these effects is selected at random; they do not each have independent chances to occur.
effect.heartgold-soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target. One of these effects is selected at random; they do not each have independent chances to occur.

short_effect.diamond-pearl: Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

short_effect.heartgold-soulsilver: Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user strikes with a simultaneous three- beam attack. May also paralyze, burn, or freeze the target.
flavor_text.platinum: The user strikes with a simultaneous three- beam attack. May also paralyze, burn, or freeze the target.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user strikes with a simultaneous three- beam attack. May also paralyze, burn, or freeze the target.
